title: Deadlinks Workbench
content:
[[tabview]]

[[tab Module workbench]]
Some modules which show wanted pages, orphaned pages, and some other miscellaneous information like watchers and page drafts.
[[/tab]]

[[tab WantedPages]]
[[module WantedPages]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab OrphanedPages]]
[[module OrphanedPages]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Watchers]]
[[module Watchers noActions="true"]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab ListDrafts]]
[[module ListDrafts]]
[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
author: aismallard
